snippet: LIEBERMAN--Marilyn, on April 10, age 80. Loving wife of the late Howard Lieberman. Daughter of Sylvia and Arthur Chodosh. Survived by Lawrence Lieberman and Rita of Dobbs Ferry, NY, and Alan Lieberman and Valerie of Cranford, NJ, and four devoted grandchildren. Donations to the JED Foundation for Emotional Health www.JEDfoundation.org/ donate. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LIEBERMAN--Marilyn, on April 10, age 80. Loving wife of the late Howard Lieberman. Daughter of Sylvia and Arthur Chodosh.
